Climate Change and Sustainable Development in International
Climate change not only poses a profound challenge to sustainable development
. From the early stages of the IPCC assessment process, this challenge and t
climate change and sustainable development have been well recognized. For example, the First
Assessment Report (FAR) highlighted the relevance of sustainable development for climate policy. The
urther to include equity issues in its presentation of sustainable
